| History                 = The Daichi Doku were a [[Yakuza]] clan operating in NY City, where they were running protection rackets and infringing in [[Geraci Crime Family (Earth-616)|Geraci]] territory. They had a confrontation with the [[Frank Castle (Earth-616)|Punisher]] who killed several of them, warning them to stay out of his territory.{{r|Punisher Vol 3 #3}} After which they joined forces with rival mobs in the assault on the Geraci mansion, destroying the Geraci family.{{r|Punisher Vol 3 #10}}
